summary: User timeline_3 describes dealing with social anxiety and isolation, with increasing engagement in treatment.

posts.text: Haven't left my apartment in days. I'm a burden to everyone I pushed everyone away Forced myself to go for a walk today talked to a friend about what I'm going through and called my sister. I deserve to get better
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. tried a new coping mechanism Things can get better Had a bad moment yesterday. I'm worthless and pathetic But I worked through it using my tools. Things can get better
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. Nothing will ever get better Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I'm failing at everything But I remembered my safety plan wrote in my journal and texted my sponsor. I'm learning healthier coping skills
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I want to give up on everything I'm worthless. I stopped taking my medication Did one small thing today - made my bed. started going to therapy Trying to celebrate tiny victories. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Three weeks without self-harming. reached out for help So proud of myself. Taking it one day at a time Almost slipped up. I'm worthless and pathetic But I reached out for help instead. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. I want to give up on everything I'm losing my mind But yesterday I finally reached out to my therapist and scheduled an appointment. I'm being patient with myself
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. Nothing will ever get better I gave up trying Managed to shower and eat breakfast. went for a walk to clear my head Small steps are still steps forward. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Three weeks without self-harming. started going to therapy So proud of myself. I'm committed to my recovery Almost slipped up. I'm a burden to everyone But I reached out for help instead. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: The new medication makes me feel numb. I want to give up on everything I don't feel like myself anymore. I isolated myself from all my friends Scheduled an appointment to discuss adjusting the dosage. wrote in my journal Keeping a mood journal to track changes. Small steps are still progress
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I'm disgusting I don't care about anything anymore Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. reached out to my therapist Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. Everyone would be better off without me I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I don't care about anything anymore But I've been practicing the breathing exercises practiced my coping strategies and it's starting to help. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I relapsed again last night. I'm worthless and pathetic I hate myself for it. I pushed everyone away Called my therapist this morning went for a walk to clear my head and we talked through it. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
I'm proud of myself for trying
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I push everyone away when I'm depressed. I'm worthless and pathetic I can't see a future for myself Trying to communicate better with my partner. tried a new coping mechanism I apologized and explained what I'm going through. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I feel completely hopeless I gave up trying Managed to shower and eat breakfast. took my medication as prescribed Small steps are still steps forward. I'm being patient with myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
